path.description: Path value must be a valid string. Empty strings are allowed but will generate a warning.

CPU_LIMIT.description: Maximum number of CPU cores to use for processing. Most performance-intensive tasks run with multiprocessing. Set this to as high as possible, but not higher than the number of available cores.

TIMEKEEP.description: Whether to log execution times. If true, runtimes are stored in 'timekeep.txt'.

ignore.description: Controls which modules to run (false) or ignore (true). Set modules to false to include them in the pipeline run.

cord_loader.description: Ignore the CORD-19 loader module if true.

downloader.description: Ignore the PubMed ID downloader module if true.

text_loader.description: Ignore the plain text loader module if true.

pubmed_bulk_downloader.description: Ignore the PubMed bulk downloader module if true.

pubmed_bulk_updates_downloader.description: Ignore the PubMed bulk updates downloader module if true.

pubmed_bulk_loader.description: Ignore the PubMed bulk loader module if true.

splitter.description: Ignore the sentence splitter module if true.

ner.description: Ignore the Named Entity Recognition (NER) module if true.

analysis.description: Ignore the analysis module if true.

merger.description: Ignore the file merger module if true.

metrics.description: Ignore the metrics evaluation module if true.

nel.description: Ignore the Named Entity Linking (NEL) module if true.

result_inspection.description: Ignore the result inspection module if true.

downloader.description: Downloader module configuration for PubMed IDs.

input_path.description: Path to file containing PubMed IDs to download.

output_path.description: Output folder path for downloaded articles.

batch_size.description: Number of articles per output batch file.

output_path.description: Output folder path for processed CORD-19 data.

subset.description: If true, process only a subset of the CORD-19 data.

subset_file.description: Path to file with CORD UIDs if subset is true.

input_path.description: Path to input .txt file or folder.

output_path.description: Output folder path for JSON files.

prefix.description: Prefix for IDs in the output JSON.

pubmed_bulk_downloader.description: PubMed bulk downloader module configuration for baseline XML files.

baseline.description: PubMed annual baseline version, e.g., '24' for pubmed24n0001.xml.gz.

file_start.description: Starting file number for downloading, e.g., 1 for pubmed24n0001.xml.gz.

file_end.description: Ending file number for downloading, e.g., 160 for pubmed24n0160.xml.gz.

pubmed_bulk_updates_downloader.description: PubMed bulk downloader module configuration for nightly update XML files.

download_path.description: Folder for raw downloaded update files.

update_start.description: Starting update file number to download.

update_end.description: Ending update file number to download.

count_articles.description: If true, count articles in each file and store in count.txt.

input_path.description: Input folder containing downloaded PubMed XML files.

output_path.description: Output folder for processed PubMed bulk files.

require_abstract.description: If true, only include articles with non-empty abstracts.

batch_size.description: Number of articles per output batch file.

file_start.description: Starting file number to process, e.g., 1 for pubmed24n0001.xml.gz. Default is to start with first file.

file_end.description: Ending file number to process, e.g., 160 for pubmed24n0160.xml.gz. Default is null for all files.

baseline.description: PubMed annual baseline version, e.g., '24' for pubmed24n0001.xml.gz.

input_path.description: Input folder path with JSON files to split into sentences.

output_folder.description: Output folder for sentence-split JSON files.

pubmed_bulk.description: If true, input is from PubMed bulk loader.

oneOf.description: Process files with indices between [start, end] inclusive.

batch_size.description: Number of texts per output JSON file.

input_path.description: Input folder path containing JSON batch files with texts split into sentences.

output_path.description: Output folder path where processed batches will be saved.

output_file_prefix.description: Prefix for output file names, e.g., 'ner_disease'.

model_type.description: Type of model to use: 'biobert_finetuned' for deep learning or 'spacy_phrasematcher' for dictionary-based NER.

model_folder.description: For HuggingFace models, the repo name; for local models, the path to the model folder.

model_name.description: Name of the model on HuggingFace or local file name; for dictionary-based NER, the spaCy model name.

vocab_path.description: Path to dictionary file for dictionary-based NER, e.g., 'dictionaries/covid-19_synonyms_v2.txt'.

store_tokens.description: If true store all tokens in the output for error analysis (only for dictionary-based NER); default is 'false'.

labels.description: Path to a file with label definitions, if required by the model.

clear_old_results.description: If true, clears previous results in the output folder before running.

batch_size.description: For BioBERT models, controls how many sentences are processed simultaneously during inference. Higher values generally increase GPU memory usage but improve processing speed. For dictionary-based NER, this parameter has minimal effect. Default is automatic.

anyOf.description: If set to null, tries to automatically determine the best batch size based on available hardware or if not implemented defaults to standard batch size.

reuse_optimal_batch_size.description: If true, calculates the optimal batch size only once for the first batch and reuses it for all subsequent batches. This improves performance by avoiding redundant batch size calculations.

article_limit.description: Array of two integers specifying the range of articles to process: [start, end].

entity_type.description: Entity class to be recognized, e.g., 'gene' or 'disease'.

multiprocessing.description: If true, enables multiprocessing for faster processing when using SpacyPharseMatcher dictionary based NER.

analysis.description: Analysis module configuration for quantifying and plotting entity frequencies.

input_path.description: Input folder path where all files are located.

output_path.description: Output folder path where the analysis files will be saved.

entity_type.description: Type of entity; used as a prefix for output files and plots.

plot_top_n.description: Number of top entities to plot. Defaults to 50.

merger.description: File merger module configuration for merging multiple NER/NEL outputs.

paths.description: List of input folder paths to merge.

entities.description: List of entity types to merge.

output_path.description: Output folder path for merged files.

metrics.description: Metrics module configuration for evaluating NER predictions.

predictions_file.description: File containing model predictions (in IOB2 format).

true_file.description: File containing true (annotated) values (in IOB2 format).

output_file.description: File to store precision, recall, and F1 scores.

pred_sep.description: Separator for predictions file (default is space).

true_sep.description: Separator for true annotations file (e.g., space or tab).

input_path.description: Input folder path for files to link entities.

output_path.description: Output folder path for NEL results.

result_inspection.description: Result inspection module configuration for searching entities in NER results.

input_folder.description: Input folder path containing NER results to inspect.

output_file.description: Output file path for inspection results.

entities.description: List of entities to search for in the results.
